Class PodcastValueRecipient

java.lang.Object
com.apptasticsoftware.rssreader.module.podcast.PodcastValueRecipient
public class PodcastValueRecipient extends Object
Represents a podcast value recipient that designates a destination for payments during media consumption.

Each recipient receives a "split" of the total payment according to the number of shares specified in the split attribute. This element may only exist within a <podcast:value> element.

Multiple recipients can be present in a single <podcast:value> element, allowing for distributed payment schemes among podcasters, producers, and service providers.
